mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(pname, image, filenames, price, deadlinedate, hitcount, ID, bestmoney, admin, category, auctionmenu, deal, timeout, startmoney, lastmoney, moneyup) VALUES(#{pname},#{image},#{filenames},#{price},#{deadlinedate},#{hitcount},#{ID},#{bestmoney},#{admin},#{category},#{auctionmenu},#{deal},#{timeout},#{startmoney},#{lastmoney},#{moneyup});
mapper.select: select * from product where auctionmenu='일반' and deal=1 order by uploaddate desc;
select * from product where auctionmenu='블라인드' and deal=1 order by uploaddate desc;
SELECT * FROM product where deal=1 order by hitcount desc;
SELECT * from product where deal=1 order by (TIMESTAMPDIFF(day, NOW(), deadlinedate)+1) asc;
mapper.update: update product set hitcount= hitcount+1 where pno=#{pno};
update product set timeout=(TIMESTAMPDIFF(day, NOW(), deadlinedate)+1);
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM auction where pno=#{pno};
mapper.insert: insert into auction(ID, pno, myprice) values(#{ID}, #{pno}, #{myprice});
mapper.update: update product set count =count+1, bestmoney =bestmoney+startmoney, getcustomer=#{getcustomer} where pno=#{pno};
update product set count =count+1, bestmoney =bestmoney+moneyup, getcustomer=#{getcustomer} where pno=#{pno};
mapper.select: select * from product where category=#{category} and auctionmenu='일반' and deal=1 order by uploaddate desc;
SELECT * FROM product WHERE category=#{category} and auctionmenu='블라인드' and deal=1 ORDER BY uploaddate DESC;
